remarks: Characterization of inverses in a structure product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
prdsinvlem.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsinvlem.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
prdsinvlem.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` Y ) $.
prdsinvlem.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsinvlem.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdsinvlem.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> Grp ) $.
prdsinvlem.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
prdsinvlem.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g o. R ) $.
prdsinvlem.n $e |- N = ( y e. I |-> ( ( invg ` ( R ` y ) ) ` ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
prdsinvlem $p |- ( ph -> ( N e. B /\ ( N .+ F ) = .0. ) ) $.
$d B y $.
$d F y $.
$d I y $.
$d R y $.
$d S y $.
$d V y $.
$d W y $.
$d Y y $.
$d ph y $.
